decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title(s): Revised Plans PL1001E - Proposed Ground Floor Plan, PL1002E - Proposed First Floor Plan, PL1003C - Proposed Ground Floor Plan (no.103), PL1004C - Proposed Ground Floor Plan (no.105), PL1005F - Proposed Rear Elevation, PL1006E - Proposed Side Elevation, PL1007E - Proposed Cross Section and PL1008D - Proposed Front Elevation
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023)(Updated).
| The development hereby permitted shall be commenced and completed in its entirety and simultaneously.

Reason: In the interests of visual appearance and to ensure the living conditions of the occupiers of each property is protected, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021). | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2023 (Updated),  policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012).
description: Single storey rear/side extension incorporating double-glazed flank doors and window with associated patios and privacy screens (ground floor flank facing no.99 Brunswick Road)(following demolition of existing extensions and associated patios)(nos.103 and 105 Brunswick Road)(Joint Application)
